Contact_Table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Contact_Table(IDLocal CHAR,IDWeb CHAR,FirstName CHAR,LastName CHAR,EmailAddress CHAR,Password CHAR,CustomerIDLocal CHAR,CustomerIDWeb CHAR,JobIDForce CHAR,LastUpdatedDateTime CHAR,LoginBarcode CHAR,Orderdirect CHAR ,addanyproduct CHAR )
Customer_Table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Customer_Table(IDLocal CHAR,IDWeb CHAR,FirstName CHAR,LastName CHAR,EmailAddress CHAR,Password CHAR,CustomerAccountIDLocal CHAR,JobIDForce CHAR,LastUpdatedDateTime CHAR,LoginBarcode CHAR,Orderdirect CHAR ,addanyproduct CHAR)
List_to_Contact: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS List_to_Contact(IDLocal CHAR,IDWeb CHAR,ContactIDLocal CHAR,ContactIDWeb CHAR,ListIDLocal CHAR,ListIDWeb CHAR,IsActive INTEGER,IsDefault CHAR)
Product: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Product(ID CHAR,Code CHAR,Name CHAR,Barcode1 CHAR,Barcode2 CHAR,Barcode3 CHAR,SearchText CHAR,URL CHAR,ImageURL CHAR,IsActive INTEGER)
ProductCodes: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ProductCodes(ProductIDLocal CHAR,Barcode CHAR,SupplierID CHAR)
Product_Control_Line: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Product_Control_Line(IDLocal CHAR,IDWeb CHAR,ListIDLocal CHAR,ListIDWeb CHAR,ProductIDLocal CHAR,LastUpdatedDateTime CHAR)
Product_Control_List: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Product_Control_List(IDLocal CHAR,IDWeb CHAR,Name CHAR,LastUpdatedDateTime CHAR,CustomerIDLocal CHAR,CustomerIDWeb CHAR,IsDefault CHAR,ReLoginToSubmit CHAR)
Usage: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Usage(IDLocal CHAR,ListIDLocal CHAR,CustomerIDLocal CHAR,ContactIDLocal CHAR,CreatedDateTime CHAR,JobID CHAR,Longitude CHAR,Latitude CHAR,Orderdirect CHAR,Processed CHAR)
Usage_Line: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Usage_Line(IDLocal CHAR,UsageIDLocal CHAR,ProductIDLocal CHAR,Quantity CHAR,CreatedDateTime CHAR,Orderdirect CHAR,Processed CHAR)
